name: Code G Slide
description:
An arcade and platform game developed by a student and inspired by the famous anime Code G.

In this game, one goal, dodge enemies from both sides of the chessboard in order to get the best score. Each dodged enemy gets a point. The more points you get, the more coins you get. The coins will allow you to buy new skins as well as new maps. Getting a high score will also unlock exclusive skins.

Being inspired by the anime Code G. you'll find in this game many references to anime whether on the maps or on the skins you play but also on some quotes of characters.

Get the highest score and win every challenges to become the best Code G Slide player in the world !
